attributes.action: Close borders of the United Kingdom to stop the spread of Coronavirus Variants.
attributes.additional_details: The Prime Minister has introduced many restrictions in the UK but has not yet closed any borders to other countries that still pose a threat via transmission of the virus : plane, airport or other public transportation to enter our nation.
attributes.background: Government needs to close the borders of the United Kingdom for all but essential travel excluding imports of supplies and medical equipment.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564165
